Welcome to riserfit's documentation!
=========================================

Version: 0.0.2
This is the documentation of `riserfit`, a Python library
used for morphological dating of terrace risers.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   about
   install
   diffusion_equations
   licence
   riserfit
